atk-abh03a44:2_0: 1-9. Idāni teyeva mūlayamake desite kusalādidhamme saccavasena saṅgaṇhitvā dhātuyamakānantaraṁ
atk-abh03a44:2_1: desitassa saccayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti. Tatthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṇṇattivārādayo
atk-abh03a44:2_2: tayo mahāvārā antaravārādayo ca avasesappabhedā veditabbā. Paṇṇattivāre panettha
atk-abh03a44:2_3: catunnaṁ saccānaṁ vasena padasodhanavāro, padasodhanamūlacakkavāro, suddhasaccavāro,
atk-abh03a44:2_4: suddhasaccamūlacakkavāroti imesu catūsu vāresu yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:3_0: 10-26. Paṇṇattivāraniddese pana avasesaṁ dukkhasaccanti dukkhavedanāya ceva taṇhāya
atk-abh03a44:3_1: ca vinimuttā tebhūmakadhammā veditabbā. Avaseso samudayoti saccavibhaṅge niddiṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalādibhedo
atk-abh03a44:3_3: ceva khaṇabhaṅganirodho ca. Avaseso maggoti ‘‘tasmiṁ kho pana samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo
atk-abh03a44:3_4: hoti, aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, micchāmaggo, jaṅghamaggo, sakaṭamaggo’’ti evamādiko.
atk-abh03a44:6_0: 27-164. Pavattivāre panettha paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye ‘‘yassa dukkhasaccaṁ
atk-abh03a44:6_1: uppajjati, tassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati; yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a44:6_2: tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatī’’ti dukkhasaccamūlakehi tīhi, samudayasaccamūlakehi
atk-abh03a44:6_3: dvīhi, nirodhasaccamūlakena ekenāti labbhamānañca alabbhamānañca gahetvā pāḷivasena
atk-abh03a44:6_4: chahi yamakehi bhavitabbaṁ. Tesu yasmā nirodhassa neva uppādo, na nirodho yujjati,
atk-abh03a44:6_5: tasmā dukkhasaccamūlakāni samudayasaccamaggasaccehi saddhiṁ dve, samudayasaccamūlakaṁ
atk-abh03a44:6_6: maggasaccena saddhiṁ ekanti tīṇi yamakāni āgatāni. Tassa paṭilomanayepi okāsavārādīsupi
atk-abh03a44:6_7: eseva nayo. Evamettha sabbavāresu tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ yamakānaṁ vasena yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:6_8: Atthavinicchaye panettha idaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ – imassa hi saccayamakassa pavattivāre nirodhasaccaṁ
atk-abh03a44:6_9: tāva na labbhateva. Sesesu pana tīsu samudayasaccamaggasaccāni ekantena pavattiyaṁyeva
atk-abh03a44:6_10: labbhanti. Dukkhasaccaṁ cutipaṭisandhīsupi pavattepi labbhati. Paccuppannādayo pana
atk-abh03a44:6_11: tayo kālā cutipaṭisandhīnampi pavattiyāpi vasena labbhanti. Evamettha yaṁ yaṁ labbhati,
atk-abh03a44:7_0: Tatridaṁ nayamukhaṁ – sabbesaṁ upapajjantānanti antamaso suddhāvāsānampi. Tepi hi
atk-abh03a44:7_2: ekakoṭṭhāsassa uppattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tasmā pañcavokāravaseneva gahetabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_3: Catuvokāre pana taṇhāvippayuttassa phalasamāpatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe ekampi saccaṁ
atk-abh03a44:7_4: nuppajjati. Idaṁ idha na gahetabbaṁ. Tesaṁ dukkhasaccañcāti tasmiñhi khaṇe taṇhaṁ
atk-abh03a44:7_5: ṭhapetvā sesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nāma hotīti sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ. Maggassa uppādakkhaṇepi
atk-abh03a44:7_6: eseva nayo. Tattha pana rūpameva dukkhasaccaṁ nāma. Sesā maggasampayuttakā dhammā
atk-abh03a44:7_7: saccavinimuttā. Teneva kāraṇena ‘‘arūpe maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a44:7_8: no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatī’’ti vuttaṁ. Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa
atk-abh03a44:7_9: uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tatthāti tesaṁ tasmiṁ upapattikkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇe
atk-abh03a44:7_10: cāti evamettha khaṇavasena okāso veditabbo. Aññesupi evarūpesu eseva nayo. Anabhisametāvīnanti
atk-abh03a44:10_0: 165-170. Pariññāvāre pana ñātapariññā, tīraṇapariññā, pahānapariññāti tissopettha
atk-abh03a44:10_1: pariññāyo labbhanti. Yasmā ca lokuttaradhammesu pariññā nāma natthi; tasmā idha dve
atk-abh03a44:10_2: saccāni gahitāni. Tattha dukkhasaccaṁ parijānātīti ñātatīraṇapariññāvaseneva vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:10_3: Samudayasaccaṁ pajahatīti ñātapahānapariññāvasena. Iti imāsaṁ pariññānaṁ vasena sabbapadesu attho veditabboti.
